post_detail.title: Elizabeth Arden
post_detail.description:
Challenge:

ClickFire Media was challenged to create a microsite for the launch of Mariah Carey’s new fragrance line, Lollipop Bling.

Execution:

CFM created an interactive guilt-free candy wonderland inspired by Mariah’s NYC hometown skyline to introduce the launch of Lollipop Bling- her new trio of delightful sugary scented fragrances. We also developed interactive digital engagements with socialmedia integration to increase awareness, buzz, site traffic and site stickiness.
